mapper.select: select et.*, eetc.name as typeCategoryName from exp_expense_type et ,exp_expense_type_category eetc where et.type_category_id = eetc.id and et.deleted = 0 ${ew.sqlSegment}
select et.*, eetc.name as typeCategoryName from exp_expense_type et ,exp_expense_type_category eetc where et.type_category_id = eetc.id and et.id = #{id} and et.deleted = 0 order by et.sequence asc

SELECT t.* FROM exp_expense_type t WHERE t.type_flag = #{typeFlag} AND t.set_of_books_id = #{setOfBooksId} AND t.enabled = 1 AND t.deleted = 0
AND t.code LIKE concat(concat('%', #{code}), '%')
AND t.name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{name}), '%')
AND t.type_category_id = #{typeCategoryId}
AND 1 = 1
AND EXISTS (select 1 from exp_adjust_type_assign_e_t a where a.exp_adjust_type_id = #{documentTypeId} and a.exp_expense_id = t.id)
AND EXISTS (select 1 from exp_report_type_expense_type ertet where ertet.report_type_id = #{documentTypeId} and ertet.expense_type_id = t.id)
AND NOT EXISTS (select 1 from exp_adjust_type_assign_e_t a where a.exp_adjust_type_id = #{documentTypeId} and a.exp_expense_id = t.id)
AND NOT EXISTS (select 1 from exp_report_type_expense_type ertet where ertet.report_type_id = #{documentTypeId} and ertet.expense_type_id = t.id)
SELECT t.id FROM exp_expense_type t WHERE t.type_flag = 1 AND t.set_of_books_id = #{setOfBooksId} AND t.enabled = 1 AND t.deleted = 0 AND t.code = #{expenseTypeCode}
SELECT t.id FROM exp_expense_type t WHERE t.type_flag = 0 AND t.set_of_books_id = #{setOfBooksId} AND t.enabled = 1 AND t.deleted = 0 AND t.code = #{applicationTypeCode}

select eet.id,eet.code,eet.name,eetc.name categoryName from exp_expense_type_category eetc , exp_expense_type eet where eetc.id=eet.type_category_id AND eet.ENABLED = 1
AND eet.code like concat(concat('%',#{code}),'%')
AND eet.name like concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
AND eetc.name like concat(concat('%',#{categoryName}),'%')
AND eet.set_of_books_id = #{setOfBooksId}
